name: George Barnsdale & Sons Ltd
overview:
We have been manufacturing premium quality timber windows and doors since 1884. Every product is designed, engineered and hand finished in the UK by our team of skilled craftsmen using the finest materials and state of the art machinery.

Our extensive product range includes casement windows, sash windows, pivot windows, tilt and turn windows, entrance doors and a wide range of patio doors. These are available in traditional, historic and contemporary styles. We also offer bespoke products, customised for specific requirements.

Our website, literature and information has been tailored to meet the specific requirements of each sector including homeowners, professionals, architects and installers.

Investment in research, development and testing has enabled us to achieve the very highest levels in thermal, weather-proof, security and acoustic performance. Our complete range of timber windows and wooden doors have been sourced and manufactured in a sustainable way.
